processors.name: MergeRecord
processors.comments: To merge all the individual records belonging to the same original CSV - so that it can come together in its corresponding output CSV

processors.name: UpdateAttribute
processors.comments:
To set attributes for base_filename, image_folder, output_folder

base_filename: for record tracking purposes, so that MergeRecord can merge records from the same CSV file.
image_folder: to specify which directory the decoded images will be saved to.
output_folder: to specify which directory the output CSVs will be saved to.
